module.name: Day Night Mode
module.description: Day / Night control - allows for two destinations to be chosen and provides a feature code that toggles between the two destinations.
module.changelog: *2.8.0.0* #4309 *2.7.0.0* spelling errors, localizations *2.6.0.2* #3585 custom recordings *2.6.0.1* init tabindex *2.6.0.0* #3650, #3651 *2.5.0.12* #3350 *2.5.0.11* localization updates *2.5.0.10* #3318 set BLF in GUI *2.5.0.9* localization string enclosures *2.5.0.8* #3215 *2.5.0.7* #3214, #3222 *2.5.0.6* localization, Swedish *2.5.0.5* #3138 Sqlite3 fixes *2.5.0.4* #2998, #3004 fix link status to timecondition, spelling *2.5.0.3* #2954 hint not getting written fixed *2.5.0.2* #2903, #2882 more changes, depends on 2.5.0 *2.5.0.1* #2882: added hook to associated a timecondtion with a daynight mode condtion *2.5.0* change to create feature code for each index, add func_devstate blf *2.4.0.3* #2734 fixed issue creating index with no description made it disapear *2.4.0.2* #2604, #2843 fix mal-formed html tags, Russian Translation *2.4.0.1* #2591 added depends on 2.4.0 *2.4.0* extension/dest registry, it translation *1.0.2.4* #2414 fix other unmatched ) syntax error *1.0.2.3* #2414 fix unmatched ) syntax error *1.0.2.2* bump for rc1 *1.0.2.1* added xml attribute needsenginedb, fixed some undefined vars *1.0.2* Added red/green color coding of rnav to see current mode *1.0.1* #2047 got day/night reversed *1.0.0* First release for FreePBX 2.3
